metadata.Title: CVE-2011-0704 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
389 Directory Server 1.2.7.5, when built with mozldap, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (replica crash) by sending an empty modify request.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2011-0704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2build1
389-ds-base - 1.4.4.11-2build1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.4.11-2build1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.4.11-2build1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.4.11-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4.11-2build1').
